Module.Name: Dust concentration distributions
Module.Description: Dust concentration distributions are specified by a mean, cv and distribution type (lognormal). Specify the occurrence percentage as the percentage of samples that has positive concentrations.
Module.ShortDescription: Dust concentration distributions data are data on analytical measurements of chemical substances occurring in dust samples.
Module.CalculationDescription: Dust concentration distributions are computed from dust concentrations data.
Module.DataDescription: Dust concentration distributions data can be entered using the internal, relational data format.
